titleStmt.title: The Parliaments last order and determination for the safety and security of Hull with their present order for 1000 men to be presently raised and sent for the preservation therof : with the project of the Earl of Lindsey to stop all passage for provision to the said town : with the apprehension and taking of 9 Irish rebels the manner and means of their taking which on Saturday last were brought to London and are now in New-gate : whereunto is annexed a declaration of the Lords and Commons concerning the distractions of the Kingdome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
